personalities: Very Frail, Smart, Nimble / Frail, Tender, Very Smart
sets.detail:
200 Ranged Attack with Smart / V Smart is to hit as hard as possible 
 200 Speed is to be as fast as possible, with Nimble it outspeeds Nimble Zepholen, without Nimble it outspeeds Nimble Falkyrie 
 4 Energy = 251 Energy at level 50 for (3 Foul Chants + 2 Pyrokinesis + 1 Peace of Mind) 
 96 HP is leftovers and makes Electric Essence Overcharged Phagenaut Thunderstrike 2HKO
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
